00028 //: General Polyline class, part of the vsol_curve_2d hierarchy
00029 
00030 class vsol_polyline_2d : public vsol_curve_2d
00031 {
00032  protected:

00035   //***************************************************************************
00036

00040   vcl_vector<vsol_point_2d_sptr> *storage_;
00041

00043   //: First point of the curve : just to conform to vsol_curve_2d standard
00044   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045   vsol_point_2d_sptr p0_;
00046 
00047   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048   //: Last point of the curve
00049   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050   vsol_point_2d_sptr p1_;
00051 
00052  public:
00053

00055   // Initialization
00056   //***************************************************************************

00087

00092 
00093   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00094   //: Return the last point of `this';  pure virtual of vsol_curve_2d

00113

00165

00167   //: Return the number of vertices
00168   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00169   unsigned int size() const { return storage_->size(); }
00170 
00171   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00172   //: Is `i' a valid index for the list of vertices ?
00173   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00174   bool valid_index(unsigned int i) const { return i<storage_->size(); }
